On 1/16/2021 at 12:45 AM, Kerbal Productions said:

Quick question: I saw all the files of the chatters. Are all of this made by Kerbals?

Hi. Noticed your question still being kinda open for months. I don't know everything, but overall:
Voice files are files from NASA and other sources, which are played backwards and speed up that gives it that Kerbal feel to it. IIRC, some clips might be in Spanish.

Can this mod make mission control speak while the rocket is flying , like the countdown , the phrase " launch trajectory nominal " , " maneuver complete " .... etc

 

I will make audios but not sure it will work , it would be odd that during coasting to maneuver or something an audio say " Landing complete " , it would be very very very odd , I want it to run audios on occasion.

 

Thanks in advance

Hi,

That was my plan at first (if only I had more time to put on coding).

Some conversation exchange are already triggered by distinctive game events. But for now they are still random chatter.

But with some effort, actual and logical exchange in par with situations are doable yep. ;)

No need to do the audio file yourself as they are already plenty on Nasa audio archive site and such, look at the end of first post here for links.

But if you want to help you are welcome. Sorting audio files by event maybe one folder by event would be a good start.

I will see if I am able to add an option to trigger audio files in matching folders. Maybe adding subtitles options would be great as well. (This was on my list some years ago, ... Time passes so fast ...)
